attributes.action: commission the building of a Road Bridge accross the Duddon Estuary between Barrow in Furness and Millom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The building of a Road Bridge accross the Duddon Estuary, linking Barrow in Furness and Millom will ease the traffic to Sellafield along the A595 and make the road safe for all users.
The Bridge will also open up the West Coast of Cumbria so all can enjoy this stunning part of the country.
